H0.text: Which businessman on his elevation to the House of Lords, by Gordon Brown, in 2000, took the title Baron of Clapton. Alan Sugar

H1.text: Which businessman on his elevation to the House of Lords, by Gordon Brown, in 2000, took the title Baron of Clapton. Richard Branson

H2.text: Which businessman on his elevation to the House of Lords, by Gordon Brown, in 2000, took the title Baron of Clapton. Philip Green

H3.text: Which businessman on his elevation to the House of Lords, by Gordon Brown, in 2000, took the title Baron of Clapton. Amsair

A4.text: On 20 July 2009, he was made Baron Sugar, of Clapton, in the London Borough of Hackney.

A5.text: During Prime Minister Gordon Brown's cabinet reshuffle on 5 June 2009, the BBC reported that he would be given a life peerage.
